description:
Enjoy the red earth passing beneath you at this beautiful tourist destination in Arizona. Breathtaking cliffs surround the trail, cacti and rocks line your path, the sun beams down.

Get connected with Treadmill TV on:
facebook.com/treadmilltv
instagram.com/treadmilltvphotos
Help make more videos possible with your support:
patreon.com/treadmilltv

Support Treadmill TV. Subscribe to the APP!
IOS: https://tinyurl.com/iostreadmilltv
Android: https://tinyurl.com/playtreadmilltv

Oak Openings is a quiet getaway just outside of Toledo Ohio that feels like your closer to the beach than the farm. Navigate the trails over sand, through the pines, and back to the start for a nice short run. 

The following are affiliate links. If you make a purchase through an affiliate link, Treadmill TV will receive a commission.

Take the walk from Lake Mead to The Hoover Dam and travel through the tunnels that serviced the construction of an engineering marvel.

Enjoy a smooth path around a sunny Arizona trail. This run is brought to you by Coach Greg Reverdiau. You can find him on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3Pgq8HTvhFtWyxPRr569_A  
or on his website: http://www.altitude.run.
